name: 2ND LEVEL
description:
2nd Level is a game for children and for the people who don't want to COMPETE in game, they just
want a PLEASING EXPERIENCE and RELAXING SONG in the background.

Game Features :
** NO ADULT CONTENT
** TARGETING CHILDREN
** FUNNY
** ENTERTAINING
** PLEASING GAME EXPERIENCE
** RELAXING SONG IN THE BACKGROUND
** SIMPLE CONTROLS
** OFFLINE

How to Play :
** tap on the blue color balls to have 200 points.
** drag the pink ball and aim to other balls or just simply tap on the balls to collide.
** red balls or normal enemy balls damages you 200 points.
** golden red balls or boss enemy balls damages you 1000 points.
** green plus sign gives you an extra life.

So without more thoughts install the game on your phone and enjoy the RELAXING MUSIC and SMOOTH
EXPERIENCE of the game.

Our game is mainly targeted to CHILDREN. This game is really FUN TO PLAY and ADDICTIVE.
